talent_zoey_root.name: Feline Lifesteal
talent_zoey_root.description: Zoey's wildcat DNA enhances her survival. She gains 7% lifesteal, recovering health equal to a portion of the damage she deals.

mana_drain.name: Essence Theft
mana_drain.description: Zoey's attacks drain the essence of her foes. When she deals damage, she steals 2% of the damage dealt as mana from the target.

weakening_strike.name: Weakening Strike
weakening_strike.description: Zoey's damaging abilities have a 10% chance to weaken her foes. Affected enemies deal 20% less damage for 2 turns.

improved_sparkle_burst.name: Improved Sparkle Burst
improved_sparkle_burst.description: Zoey's mastery over her Sparkle Burst increases its accuracy. Hit chance increases from 50% to 80%.

improved_heart_pounce.name: Improved Heart Pounce
improved_heart_pounce.description: Zoey's Heart Pounce becomes more accurate but the vulnerability it inflicts is shorter. Hit chance increases by 10%, but Vulnerable debuff duration reduced from 5 to 2 turns.

rapid_combat.name: Rapid Combat
rapid_combat.description: Zoey's mastery over both precision and magic reach perfect harmony. All of her abilities have their cooldowns reduced by 1 turn, allowing for more frequent ability usage.

feline_combo.name: Feline Combo
feline_combo.description: Zoey's combat mastery allows her to chain her attacks together. Heart Pounce has a 35% chance to reset its cooldown and allow another action without ending the turn.

enhanced_heart_pounce.name: Enhanced Heart Pounce
enhanced_heart_pounce.description: Zoey's Heart Pounce becomes even more devastating. It now scales with additional 50% physical damage and 50% magical damage, increasing the total scaling from 125% to 225%.

sparkle_pounce.name: Sparkle Pounce
sparkle_pounce.description: Zoey's Sparkle Burst becomes even more dynamic. When Sparkle Burst successfully hits an enemy, it has a 10% chance to automatically cast Heart Pounce on that same target without using mana or triggering cooldown.

predatory_instinct.name: Predatory Instinct
predatory_instinct.description: Zoey's predatory nature takes over completely. Heart Pounce is disabled as a manual ability but automatically activates at the start of each turn, targeting the enemy with the lowest health. This automatic cast ignores cooldowns and costs no mana.

cat_agility.name: Feline Reflexes
cat_agility.description: Zoey's cat-like reflexes allow her to dodge incoming attacks. She gains 8% dodge chance.

pounce_momentum.name: Pounce Momentum
pounce_momentum.description: Zoey's Heart Pounce has a 20% chance to grant her a 10% dodge buff for 3 turns when it hits a target.

agile_counterforce.name: Agile Counterforce
agile_counterforce.description: When Zoey successfully dodges an attack, she gains a buff increasing her Magical Damage by 10% of her current value for 4 turns. This effect can stack.

allied_bond.name: Allied Bond
allied_bond.description: At the start of combat, Zoey forms a bond with her strongest ally, gaining 20% of their highest stat permanently for the duration of the battle.

pack_leadership.name: Pack Leadership
pack_leadership.description: Zoey's inspiring presence strengthens her allies. All party members gain 5% of Zoey's total stats, sharing in her feline prowess and magical power.

symbiotic_healing.name: Symbiotic Healing
symbiotic_healing.description: Zoey's bond with her allies creates a web of shared vitality. When she deals damage, 1% of that damage is converted into healing that restores both herself and all party members.

feline_vitality.name: Feline Vitality
feline_vitality.description: Zoey's mastery over life energy reaches its peak. Her feline resilience makes all healing effects 35% more powerful when applied to her, allowing her to recover from wounds with supernatural efficiency.

purifying_magic.name: Purifying Magic
purifying_magic.description: Zoey's magical abilities have a 10% chance to cleanse one random debuff from herself when she uses any ability.

combat_mastery.name: Combat Mastery
combat_mastery.description: Zoey's mastery over her combat abilities reduces their cooldowns. Heart Pounce cooldown is reduced by 1 turn, and Sparkle Burst cooldown is reduced by 2 turns.

enduring_magic.name: Enduring Magic
enduring_magic.description: Zoey's mastery over magical energies allows her to sustain beneficial effects longer. All buffs applied to Zoey last 1 additional turn, extending their duration and maximizing their effectiveness.

mystic_barrier.name: Mystic Barrier
mystic_barrier.description: Zoey's magical prowess manifests as a protective barrier. She gains 400 shield for each active non-permanent buff on her. Shield absorbs damage before health and disappears when buffs are lost.

double_bell_mark.name: Double Bell Mark
double_bell_mark.description: Zoey's mastery over her Sparkle Bell Mark reaches new heights. When applying a Sparkle Bell Mark, she has a 15% chance to apply it twice instead of once, creating a double-marked enemy that suffers even more from her focused attacks.

bell_recast.name: Bell Recast
bell_recast.description: Zoey's mastery over the Strawberry Bell reaches perfection. After using Strawberry Bell Burst, she has a 10% chance to immediately recast it on the same target without consuming mana or triggering cooldown.

enhanced_light_arc.name: Enhanced Light Arc
enhanced_light_arc.description: Zoey's Glowing Light Arc becomes significantly more powerful through her mastery of magical energies. The scaling increases from 100% to 175% Magical Damage, making it a devastating area attack.

sparkle_bell_healing.name: Sparkle Bell Healing
sparkle_bell_healing.description: Zoey's Sparkle Bell Mark becomes a source of self-restoration. When a marked enemy takes boosted damage from the mark, Zoey heals herself for 35% of that boosted damage, turning her enemies' pain into her recovery.

bell_mastery.name: Bell Mastery
bell_mastery.description: Zoey's complete mastery over her Strawberry Bell transforms it into a devastating weapon of mass destruction. Strawberry Bell Burst now hits ALL ENEMIES instead of a single target, dealing 200% magical damage to each enemy with no reduction in power.
